armors.name: Dragonscale Helmet

abilities.name: Dragonhide
abilities.description: Grants resistance to fire damage and breath attacks.

armors.description: A formidable helmet crafted from the scales of Regulus Rachmana, offering exceptional protection for the head.

armors.name: Dragonscale Chestplate

abilities.name: Impenetrable
abilities.description: Increases physical defense against melee attacks.

armors.description: A magnificent chestplate forged from Regulus Rachmana's dragon scales, providing unmatched protection for the torso.

armors.name: Dragonscale Greaves
armors.description: Imposing greaves crafted from Regulus Rachmana's dragon scales, shielding the shins and knees while offering increased mobility.

armors.name: Dragonscale Shield

abilities.name: Dragon's Ward
abilities.description: Grants a chance to deflect incoming attacks.

armors.description: A magnificent shield crafted from a Regulus Rachmana's dragon scale, offering exceptional protection and a symbol of the wearer's prowess.
